name: GooglePlay2
description: Publish an APK to the Google Play store
author: Microsoft Corporation
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: serviceAccount
inputs.label: Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: The VSTS Service Endpoint that specifies the identiy you wish to publish your APK under.

inputs.name: serviceAccountKey
inputs.label: JSON Key Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The JSON file provided by Google Play that includes the service account's identity you wish to publish your APK under.

inputs.name: apkFile
inputs.label: APK File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The updated APK you wish to publish to the specified track.

inputs.name: track
inputs.label: Track
inputs.helpMarkDown: The track you wish to publish the APK to.

inputs.name: userFraction
inputs.label: Rollout Fraction
inputs.helpMarkDown: If publishing to the "rollout" track, this specifies the percentage of users to roll out your APK to.

inputs.name: changeLogFile
inputs.label: Release Notes (File)
inputs.helpMarkDown: A file specifying the changes included in this APK update.
